document.full_text: the party of myanmar's pro-democracy leader, aung san suu kyi, called on sunday for talks with the country's military rulers to clear up "misunderstandings" before a new government takes office.
document.title: suu kyi's party seeks talks with myanmar's generals
lines_and_colors: the party of myanmar's pro-democracy leader, aung san suu kyi, called on sunday for talks with the country's military rulers to clear up "misunderstandings" before a new government takes office.
